Mobileer Instrument Editor

Editing a WaveTable

Open the "Clarinet" folder and then open the " Clarinet_64.aif" folder. Then double click on the "Clarinet_64_1" file. You should see something like this:

Note that the various functions of the Wave Editor are available in both the toolbars and the menus.
